name: .ACCDA File Extension
summary: Learn about .ACCDA files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Add-in file used by Microsoft Access, a desktop relational database program; stores an application component written in Visual Basic for Applications (VBA); enables users to extend the software's features.

content: Older versions of Access use the .MDA and .MDE extensions for add-ins.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
